string.name: author
string.a: The author of this app is Leo Shang. This application is a tutorial about dynamic buttons in Android native development.

resources.string:
The application is a "Mine Sweeper" that detect bad apples in a N x N field. Try to use minimum number of scans to locate all bad apples.
Tapping on the cells to reveal bad apple or conduct a scan on that location. A scan will tell the number of bad apples in that row and column. When a bad apple is discovered, the button with scan result will update as well. Keep in mind scan accumulates when tapping on every cell, excluding:
	1. the tapped location contains a bad apple, or
	2. tapped location already scanned.
 Good Luck!
